answers.answer: Congratulations and how do you feel? Which test are you having for your EOT?
Congratulations, you made it.  A round of rootbeers for the house!  Doesn't it feel great to snap down the lid on that sharps container once and for all?  Here's to your health and SVR.jd
Congrats on making it!  Hope your feeling yourself soon!peacerita
How wonderful its over! Be well and start to enjoy yourself again.Good LuckCHARM

I feel good it's over my body could use the restI still have really dry skin...I came down with a hernia while on tx I'm scheduled for surgery Nov 4I think the meds somehow have an adverse affect on the soft tissue in the body.wall of the hernia,mouth,lips,skinI had so many cuts in my mouth while on the meds from normal use.I had to have a tooth pulled in July It took a long time to heal from the surgey ..lotta pain in the mouth,... jmhoI live with my lady so talking.I never do that much talking lolMy hemo went under 10,... 3 times, that was toughI've been using the hetimax for the VL...all the bestRangle

It feels good to have made it to the finish line,..it''s an expeiencebtw I had diabetes when I started tx,... It's gone right now ,there is no trace of it in my blood work When I found that out I went out & got some Hagen Dazheh hehRangle

question: 48 of 48....Thanks for all the support and suggestions...you guys are greatAll the best
title: I took my last this week
